sentence: In conclusion, the precision diagnosis and treatment of breast cancer have made remarkable strides in recent decades (Figure 1).

Emerging technologies—such as large-scale omics studies170, AI171, molecular imaging172, cell-based therapies173, and mRNA innovations174—are poised to drive transformative breakthroughs that may lead to the next generation of personalized therapies (Figure 2).
